map.string: {"content":"* Click the item to rename task list\n* Press the icon at the left of each row to drag the item to reorder the tasklists","id":"GoogleTaskListEditActivity.help","text_size":18,"title":"Tips","button3_name":"More","button3_url":"http:\/\/sites.google.com\/site\/gtasks4android\/","content_zh_CN":"* 在列表项中长按可以重命名\n* 按住每一行左边的图标拖动列表项进行排序","text_color":"FFFFFF","version":7}

{"content":"* Click search button to new task quickly!
 * You can disable/enable tab 'All' in the settings. * Try to long press the task. You can do 'Indent', 'Un-indent', 'Delete' and etc there.
* Select 'Task List' option menu to manage task lists","id":"GoogleTaskActivity.help","text_size":18,"title":"Tips","button3_name":"More","button3_url":"http://sites.google.com/site/gtasks4android/","content_zh_CN":"* 按一下搜索键进行快速添加任务.
* 你可以在设置页面中关闭或打开'所有列表'标签
* 长按任务会弹出工具条，可以进行删除，新增，移动等操作.
* 选择'编辑列表'进行列表的添加,删除和排序","text_color":"FFFFFF","version":9}
